preconditions.precondition: Cliente needs to request a consultation.

successEndConditions.condition: Cliente receives diagnosis and treatment plan.

failureEndConditions.condition: Veterinarian is unable to determine diagnosis.

mainSequence.step: Cliente calls to schedule a consultation with secretaria.
Secretaria confirms the consultation with cliente.
Cliente provides personal information to secretaria.
Secretaria confirms the update with cliente.
Veterinario registers the symptoms for cliente.
Veterinario diagnoses the issue and creates a treatment plan for cliente.
Cliente requests further consultation with veterinario.
Veterinario schedules diagnostic tests for cliente.
Veterinario registers examination requests for cliente.
Veterinario provides historical test results to cliente.
Veterinario provides medication prescriptions to cliente.
